00020 // Desc: Make local copies of the window properties given
00021 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 Result Forms::Init(String classname, HINSTANCE instance, int cmdshow)
00023 {
00024         fms_classname = classname;
00025         fms_instance = instance;
00026         fms_cmdshow = cmdshow;
00027 
00028         return R_OK;

00031 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // Name: CreateForm()
00033 // Desc: Create a new instance of WinForm
00034 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 Result Forms::CreateForm(FormSettings *settings)
00036 {
00037         Result rlt;
00038 
00039         WinForm* newform;
00040         CHKALLOC(newform = new WinForm());
00041         IFFAILED(newform->Init(settings, fms_classname, fms_instance, fms_cmdshow))
00042         {
00043                 REMOVE(newform);
00044                 return rlt;
00045         }
00046 
00047         CHKALLOC(forms = (WinForm**)realloc(forms, (numforms + 1) * sizeof(WinForm*)));
00048         forms[numforms++] = newform;
00049 
00050         return R_OK;
00051 }
00052 
00053 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 // Name: ShowAll()
00055 // Desc: Show all WinForms
00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 void Forms::ShowAll()
00058 {
00059         for(int i = 0; i < numforms; i++)
00060                 forms[i]->Show();
00061 }
00062 
00063 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 // Name: RemoveAll()
00065 // Desc: Remove all WinForms
00066 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 void Forms::RemoveAll()
00068 {
00069         for(int i = 0; i < numforms; i++)
00070                 REMOVE(forms[i])
00071         REMOVE_ARRAY(forms)
00072         numforms = 0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // Name: Release()
00077 // Desc: Destructor replacement (destructors can't be overloaded)
00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 void Forms::Release()
00080 {
00081         RemoveAll();
00082 
00083         delete this;
00084 }
